character.statement: That shoebox is perfect for the Lazy Bear 2000. We just need to find a way to get it down!
Perfect! Throw it to me, I'm a great shot!
I'm not sure that's what I had in mind...
I could use this wagon for the Totalmobile!
This wagon should come in handy.
The pole just isn't long enough... What I really need is something to throw!
That shoebox is too high to get to. I need to find a way to knock it down!
Maybe we can use the beach ball to knock it down!

exchange.question: What are you doing?
exchange.answer: Carefully trimming Ms. Colander's prized Topiarys.

exchange.question: Why are you doing that?
exchange.answer: Ms. Colander likes it. I like it too, though I'd like it a lot more if she'd pay me.

exchange.question: She doesn't pay you?
exchange.answer: Oh, I shouldn't say that. She eventually does. Most of the time.

character.statement: Look what you've done! How will I ever fix this?

exchange.question: I really need a wagon. If you'd just let me borrow it...
exchange.answer: No way! You've distracted me for the last time.

character.statement: Keep your mitts off that wagon!
Would you look at that... a dancing bear...
